sense.def:
A catalogue
je knjiga, v kateri je seznam blaga, ki ga ponuja določeno podjetje, ali seznam razstavnih eksponatov v muzeju.

To catalogue things
pomeni napraviti seznam predmetov.

seg.quote: Books are catalogued on white cards filed alphabetically.

sense.def:
A catalogue of things
je vrsta stvari, ki jih naštevamo drugo za drugo.

seg.quote: Mrs Zapp recited a catalogue of her husband's sins.

sense.def:
To catalogue a series of similar events or qualities
pomeni našteti vrsto sorodnih dogodkov ali lastnosti.

seg.quote: They had been cataloguing the many discomforts of life in India.
